contentList:
-- WEAPONS --
Sam's Misread Charm Necklace When the Dungeon Master didn't know what the "Charm Person" spell did.... Witcher's Silver Longsword Forged with silver from a falling star, a silver blade is an indispensable part of a witcher's monster slaying arsenal. Monster Slayer Longsword The blade reverberates with the muted cries of beasts that fell to its edge. Cunning Hand Crossbow Restored from oblivion, the bow sings with eagerness to leap into battle. Dimeritium Longsword Forged from anti-magic steel, the blood of those of magical mind and form chill at its sight.
-- WITCHER CLASS --
Witcher Born of mutation and martial training, witchers are mysterious master hunters of beasts, spoken about in hushed tones by the common folk. Mutant Enhancements The Trials have enhanced your capabilities: Toxic Tolerance Gain Poison Resistance. // Elixir Bonus Specialization: Elixir Bonus Gain one of the following additional effects while under the influence of an Elixir. Lethal Precision +2 to Attack Rolls with Proficient weapons. Sign Intensity +2 to Spell Save DC. //Witcher Expertise Witcher Expertise Gain Expertise and Proficiency in two of the following Skills. Witcher Expertise: Arcana Proficiency and Expertise in Arcana. Witcher Expertise: Investigation Proficiency and Expertise in Investigation. Witcher Expertise: Nature Proficiency and Expertise in Nature. Witcher Expertise: Medicine Proficiency and Expertise in Medicine. //Mutant Enhancements Aggravating Wounds Deal 1d8 additional damage to Bleeding and Poisoned targets. Sunder Armor Your weapon attacks apply Sunder Armor for 2 turns. AC reduced by 1. Persuasive Presence Learn the Charm Person spell. Intimidating Presence Learn the Thaumaturgy spell. Maiming Strike Your ranged weapon attacks have a high chance to apply Crippled. Melt Armor Enhanced Movement +3m movement speed Enhanced Reflexes +2 Initiative Intimidating Presence Gain Proficiency and Expertise in Intimidation. Iron Flesh Take less damage from all sources equal to your Constitution modifier. Unbreakable Mind Advantage on Constitution and Wisdom Saving Throws. Murderous Surge Once per turn, recover 6m movement speed on kills. +6m movement speed.
-- SIGNS --
Witcher Signs I Unlocks the basic form of Witcher signs Witcher Signs II Unlocks the improved form of Witcher signs Witcher Signs III Unlocks the final form of Witcher signs Aard A cone of concussive force explodes from your palm, throwing opponents back. Aard:Alt Alternate:You unleash a weaker wave of force around yourself, throwing opponents back. Igni A cone of searing flame shoots from your fingers, stinging nearby opponents Igni:Alt Alternate:A concentrated beam of fire shoots from your fingers, scorching targets further away Quen A protective shield envelops you, absorbing incoming damage. Quen:Alt Alternate:A stronger shield takes your full effort to create, shielding and healing you for incoming damage Axii Stuns your target. Axii:Alt [EASIER SAVING THROW]Alternate: Dominates an enemy to fight for you. Yrden Creates a ward on the ground before you that slowing enemies that wander in its proximity Yrden Aura Enemies within the aura are Slowed and Revealed Slowed and Revealed Yrden:Alt Alternate:Creates a damaging ward on the that deals Lightning damage to enemies in the area Yrden:Alt Aura Take Lightning damage at the start of every turn Heliotrope Gain an Action and Bonus Action. Quen:Shield Gain Temporary HP. Enemy attacks release a retaliating blast that deals Force damage Quen:Alt Enhanced Shield Gain Effects of Quen Aura. Gain additional Temporary HP, and enemy attacks heal you.
